ThonnyMenuBar: A menu bar component that mimics desktop application menus.
ThonnyToolbar: A toolbar containing icons for common actions like new file, save, run, stop.
ThonnyEditor: A Monaco-based code editor configured for Python.
ThonnyBottomPanel: A tabbed panel at the bottom for Shell, Exception, ProgramTree, TODO, and Plotter.
ThonnyRightPanel: A tabbed panel on the right for Variables and Outline.
ThonnyVariables: Displays current variable values.
ThonnyOutline: Shows the structure (functions, classes) of the code.
ThonnyPlotter: A simple line chart plotter that detects numbers printed to stdout.
AstTree: A recursive component to visualize the Abstract Syntax Tree (AST).
PackageManagerDialog: A dialog to search, install, and remove Pyodide-compatible packages.
ThonnyInfoSection: An informational section explaining the tool features and usage.
Toast: A notification system for success/error messages.
InputDialog: A modal for getting user input (e.g., filename).
useThonnyPyodide: A composable managing the Pyodide worker, code execution, AST/Outline generation, and package management.
Main Layout: Resizable 2-column layout (Editor+BottomPanel | RightPanel) with resizable rows (Editor | BottomPanel).
File Management: Create, delete, rename (save as), and switch between multiple local files (stored in localStorage).
Code Execution: Asynchronous execution of Python code via Web Worker.
Shell: Interactive REPL that accepts commands and displays types of output (stdout, error, system info).
AST generation: Generates and displays Python AST using the `ast` module.
Outline generation: Parses code to extract function and class definitions for navigation.
TODO scanning: regex-based scanning of comments for TODO/FIXME tags.
Package Management: Interface to `micropip` for installing PyPI packages.
Debounced Updates: Outline and AST updates are debounced on code change and run immediately on execution.
Mobile Responsiveness: Responsive design adjustments for smaller screens (though primarily desktop-focused layout).
